Posts.EditableText:
i know this sounds a bit harsh and rude, but would there be a chance of getting another coder to help with the progress? i just cant wait any longer for a full version of QuestNet.  ive waited too long.  As soon as it comes out i can make an MP game and advertise it on TMS, TMC, TML etc, and have it rated and played by lots and lots of people.

not only will it make me known for making fun games, but it will promote Quest greatly
